FuncDef: This command configures the service payload (Maximum Transmission Unit - MTU), in bytes, for the service. This MTU value overrides the service-type default MTU.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the size of the MTU in octets, expressed as a decimal integer. Values-1 to 9194.

ExtraInfo:
Default: service-mtu 1514The following table displays MTU values for specific VC types.
				Table 11: 
			MTU values for specific VC types VC-TypeExample Service MTUAdvertised MTU
Ethernet15141500
Ethernet (with preserved dot1q)15181504
VPLS15141500
VPLS (with preserved dot1q)15181504
VLAN (dot1p transparent to MTU value)15141500
VLAN (QinQ with preserved bottom Qtag)15181504
